summary.aiHeadline: USDA Funding Freeze and Tariffs Threaten US Agriculture in 2025
summary.aiBlurb: In 2025, US agriculture faces significant challenges as USDA funding freezes disrupt conservation efforts, rice farmers struggle with financial losses, and tariffs threaten key export markets. These factors could lead to reduced adoption of climate-smart practices, decreased rice production, and a decline in agricultural exports.
